HmacSha256Sign

HmacSha256Sign

new HmacSha256Sign()

Creates a new HmacSHA256Sign object.

Source:
  • services/hmacsha256sign.js, line 25

Methods

sign(stringToSign)

Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
stringToSign string

The UTF-8-encoded string to sign.
Source:
  • services/hmacsha256sign.js, line 36
Returns:

A String that contains the HMAC-SHA256-encoded signature.
